meanings.definition: A system of organizing days for social, religious, commercial, or administrative purposes.
meanings.sent1: My school uses a calendar to plan our holidays and events.
meanings.sent2: I always mark important dates on my calendar to remember them.
meanings.sent3: The calendar seemed to have a mind of its own, reminding me of every deadline.
meanings.sent4: Her calendar was like a trusted friend, guiding her through each day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful calendar on the wall brightened up the room with its dates and events.

meanings.definition: A table or register with the days of each month and week in a year.
meanings.sent1: Grandma keeps a beautiful calendar on her desk to track the days.
meanings.sent2: I flipped the calendar to see the new month's picture on the other side.
meanings.sent3: The calendar on the fridge was covered in cute stickers and notes.
meanings.sent4: The calendar on my phone was like a digital assistant, always reminding me of appointments.
meanings.sent5: The calendar hanging in the kitchen was a constant reminder of upcoming family gatherings.
